body:
I do not receive  compass any more at hub, is this just me or anyone else.

Anyway it is pretty annoying since the hub is laggy so it wakes for ever to get to the nebula signs

title: Where is my compass?

replies.body: LOL I don't have any compass too. It's for each player I think...
replies.body_tagged: LOL I don't have any compass too. It's for each player I think...

replies.body: or you can do /server. /server MCZone01, MCZone02, Icarus, Cronus are just some examples
replies.body_tagged: or you can do /server. /server MCZone01, MCZone02, Icarus, Cronus are just some examples

replies.body:
From what I have been hearing it is a glitch, you can always post a glitch that you find on the avicus github here: https://github.com/Avicus/Issues
Have a nice day!
replies.body_tagged:
From what I have been hearing it is a glitch, you can always post a glitch that you find on the avicus github here: https://github.com/Avicus/Issues
Have a nice day!

replies.body: Yes, it is a glitch. You can do /server (servername) or just go to which minigame you want in the lobby. This glitch will hopefully get fixed in the next update.
replies.body_tagged: Yes, it is a glitch. You can do /server (servername) or just go to which minigame you want in the lobby. This glitch will hopefully get fixed in the next update.

replies.body: Yep I'm having the same problem! I was wondering about that!
replies.body_tagged: Yep I'm having the same problem! I was wondering about that!

replies.body: No problem! :) We are happy to help!
replies.body_tagged: No problem! :) We are happy to help!

replies.body:
Wait so I have to use my feet and walk over all the way to the Nebula sign?





Lovely.

replies.body:
The issue seems to be fixed right now.
I'll be locking this to prevent further confusion. 

If in any case it comes back, please report this at 
https://github.com/Avicus/Issues
